headline: Ask HN: draw.io, excalidraw, lucidchart – which one, and why?
description:
Been using draw.io/app.diagrams.net for a long time, with fairly decent results, but I am running now into a client pushing very strong in having all his stuff built into excalidraw, and only as a backup (with proper justification) lucidchart. As I am totally unaware of excalidraw capabilities, it's fairly tough to push back, especially as it looks like Confluence integrates fairly well with either of these last two alternatives, but I am very concerned about a long learning curve, before delivering the actual results, with the ease I could now produce in draw.io.

So the Qs: has anyone had any experience with any type of transition between the three (maybe even in the other direction than what I am presented with), to know if there are some integration / translation from one to another / tips on how to handle all these tools, in migration of material, or an argument so obvious in favor of one, that might be worth investing the time to learn it (if draw.io is not the one, in my case, but the Q is more generic)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: draw.io, excalidraw, lucidchart - 哪一个，为什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: draw.io, excalidraw, lucidchart - 哪一個，為什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
我使用draw.io/app.diagrams.net已经很长时间了，效果相当不错，但我现在遇到一个客户非常强烈地要求把他所有的东西都内置到excalidraw中，而且只作为备份（有适当的理由）lucidchart。由于我完全不了解excalidraw的功能，所以很难回绝，尤其是看起来Confluence与这两个备选方案的集成度相当高，但我非常担心在交付实际结果之前会有很长的学习曲线，而我现在可以在draw.io中轻松制作。

那么问题来了：有没有人在这三者之间有任何类型的过渡经验（甚至可能是在我所面临的另一个方向），以了解是否有一些整合/从一个到另一个的翻译/关于如何处理所有这些工具的提示，在材料的迁移中，或一个明显支持一个的论点，可能值得投资时间来学习它（如果draw.io不是一个，在我的情况下，但这个问题是更通用）。

那麼問題來了：有沒有人在這三者之間有任何類型的過渡經驗（甚至可能是在我所面臨的另一個方向），以瞭解是否有一些整合/從一個到另一個的翻譯/關於如何處理所有這些工具的提示，在材料的遷移中，或一個明顯支持一個的論點，可能值得投資時間來學習它（如果draw.io不是一個，在我的情況下，但這個問題是更通用）。
